text: Allah ni Ajula juwan’gumbile jenumanja, kaneko ni kumpa lisiki, kaneko tachimpa chiwa, kaneko ni tachimpa umi (soni pakun’jimusya m’malembe). Ana mwa akwawanganya wenu (ni Allah) pana jwaakutendaga chilichose mu yalakweyi? Kuswejela ni Kwakwe soni jutalikangene kusyene ni yaakum’bwanganya nayo
